addCookie(org.apache.http.cookie.Cookie).Description: Adds an @B_org#apache#http#cookie#Cookie_E@, replacing any existing equivalent cookies. If the given cookie has already expired it will not be added, but existing values will still be removed.

getCookies().Description: Returns all cookies contained in this store.

Returns: true if any cookies were purged.
clearExpired(java.util.Date).Description: Removes all of @B_org#apache#http#cookie#Cookie_E@ in this store that have expired by the specified @B_java#util#Date_E@.

ClassDesc: Please use @B_java#net#URL#openConnection_E@ instead. Please visit Abstract cookie store.
